definition: Keynes (name)/John Maynard Keynes (1883-1946), influential British economist
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: Barro's anti-Keynesianism is at the extreme end.
sentences.chinese: 巴罗的反凯恩斯观点登峰造极。

sentences.english: Real-world evidence does not support the Keynesianism perspective.
sentences.chinese: 真实世界的证据并不支持凯恩斯主义思想的设想。

sentences.english: In that book, Keynes created the discipline now known as macroeconomics.
sentences.chinese: 在书中，凯恩斯创建了现在所说的宏观经济学。

sentences.english: International evidence also undermines the case for Keynesianism.
sentences.chinese: 国际上的证据也表明了凯恩斯主义思想的失策。

sentences.english: Say it loud, say it proud, we're all Keynesians now.
sentences.chinese: 大声说，自豪地说，我们现在都是凯恩斯主义者。

sentences.english: But she has selected these flowers," said Cairns.
sentences.chinese: 但是她已经选择了这些花，”凯恩斯说。

sentences.english: But that’s very far from rejecting the basic Keynesian insight that demand matters.
sentences.chinese: 但这远非是对凯恩斯主义基本认识之需求问题的驳斥。

sentences.english: There was a cost to this Keynesian victory, however.
sentences.chinese: 不过，凯恩斯主义的胜利是有代价的。

sentences.english: Cairns and Townsville fly flights are full.
sentences.chinese: 飞离凯恩斯和汤斯维尔的航班皆满员。

sentences.english: There are benches, wireless network, the empty city of Cairns International Airport, Australia.
sentences.chinese: 有台，无线网络，凯恩斯国际机场，澳大利亚空城。

sentences.english: And the results were clearly Keynesian.
sentences.chinese: 结果是明显的凯恩斯主义者。

sentences.english: IS-LM analysis is is a major tool of Keynesian theory.
sentences.chinese: LM模型是凯恩斯理论体系的主要分析工具。

sentences.english: In the post-war years the Treasury was a hub for Keynesian demand management.
sentences.chinese: 在战后几年财政部曾是凯恩斯主义需求管理的中心。

sentences.english: ROBERT SKIDELSKY: Keynes was the real inventor of macroeconomics.
sentences.chinese: 凯恩斯是宏观经济学的真正创始人。

sentences.english: Cairns points to the success of recycling programs in the automotive battery industry.
sentences.chinese: 凯恩斯指出了回收项目在汽车电池工业的成绩。

sentences.english: This was one of Keynes’s insights.
sentences.chinese: 这是凯恩斯的一项洞见。

definition: Charles Darwin (1809-1882), British biologist and author of "On the Origin of Species" 物種起源|物种起源[Wu3 zhong3 Qi3 yuan2]/Darwin, capital of the Northern Territory (Australia) 北領地|北领地[Bei3 Ling3 di4]
Milton (name)/John Milton (1608-1674), English republican writer and poet, author of Paradise Lost
Adam Smith (1723-1790), Scottish ethical philosopher and pioneer economist, author of The Wealth of Nations 國富論|国富论
Russell (name)/Bertrand Arthur William, 3rd Earl Russell (1872-1970), British logician, rationalist philosopher and pacifist
Sydney, capital of New South Wales, Australia
Alice Springs, town in central Australia
